physical_appearance: This is a cotton jacket. It is embroidered with multicolored cotton thread, creating repeated patterns. In the center, there is an inscription in Gujarati.
sgcool_label_text: A cotton jacket for men, traditionally worn by the Dhebaria Rabari community of Kutch in Gujarat. This jacket has been embroidered with the name of the person intended to wear it.
subject_terms_1: folk costume Western Indian embroidery (visual works)
